languages.text: "Доподлинно известно, что корабль претерпел множество модификаций, в их числе: замена макровооружения на дальнобойные лазерные батареи и макробатареи малой дальности. И... Боюсь, это все, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Доподлинно известно, что корабль претерпел множество модификаций, в их числе: замена макровооружения на дальнобойные лазерные батареи и макробатареи малой дальности. И... Боюсь, это все, Лорд-капитан".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Доподлинно известно, что корабль претерпел множество модификаций, в их числе: замена макровооружения на дальнобойные лазерные батареи и макробатареи малой дальности. И... Боюсь, это все, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macroweapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macrobatteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macroweapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macrobatteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macroweapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macrobatteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « On sait que le vaisseau a connu de nombreuses modifications, dont le remplacement des macrocanons par des batteries laser longue portée et des macrobatteries courte portée. Et... J'ai peur que ce soit tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « On sait que le vaisseau a connu de nombreuses modifications, dont le remplacement des macrocanons par des batteries laser longue portée et des macrobatteries courte portée. Et... J'ai peur que ce soit tout, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “众所周知，这艘飞船经过了多次改装，用远程激光炮台与短程宏炮取代了原有的宏炮。还有……恐怕我们知道的就这么多了，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “众所周知，这艘飞船经过了多次改装，用远程激光炮台与短程宏炮取代了原有的宏炮。还有……恐怕我们知道的就这么多了，舰长大人。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Es ist bekannt, dass das Schiff viele Modifikationen durchlaufen hat. Unter anderem wurden Makrowaffen gegen Langstrecken-Laserbatterien und Kurzstrecken-Makrobatterien ausgetauscht. Und ... Ich fürchte, das ist alles, was wir wissen, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist bekannt, dass das Schiff viele Modifikationen durchlaufen hat. Unter anderem wurden Makrowaffen gegen Langstrecken-Laserbatterien und Kurzstrecken-Makrobatterien ausgetauscht. Und ... Ich fürchte, das ist alles, was wir wissen, Lord Captain."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Es sabido que la nave ha sufrido muchas modificaciones, incluyendo el reemplazo de macroarmas para baterías de láser de largo alcance y macrobaterías de corto alcance. Y... Eso es todo lo que sé, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Es sabido que la nave ha sufrido muchas modificaciones, incluyendo el reemplazo de macroarmas para baterías de láser de largo alcance y macrobaterías de corto alcance. Y... Eso es todo lo que sé, Lord Capitán».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「その船が事実として多くの改造を施され、マクロ兵器が長距離レーザー砲や短距離マクロ砲に置き換えられたことが分かっています。そして…恐れ入りますが、私たちが知っているのはそれだけです、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「その船が事実として多くの改造を施され、マクロ兵器が長距離レーザー砲や短距離マクロ砲に置き換えられたことが分かっています。そして…恐れ入りますが、私たちが知っているのはそれだけです、ロード・キャプテン」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Gemiye birçok modifikasyon uygulanmış. Makro silahların yerine uzun menzilli lazer bataryalar ve kısa menzilli makro bataryalar eklenmiş. Bir de... Korkarım tüm bildiklerimiz bu kadar Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "It is known for a fact that the ship has undergone many modifications, including the replacement of macro-weapons for long-range laser batteries and short-range macro-batteries. And... I am afraid this is all we know, Lord Captain."
